about_the_game:
Are you ready to test your attention to detail while admiring the cutest cats and dogs?

In this game, you'll explore 50 colorful illustrations featuring adorable pets and challenge yourself to find between 3 and 10 differences in each picture.

What awaits you:
🐶 50 unique images of lovely cats and playful dogs.
🔍 Various difficulty levels – from easy to truly challenging puzzles.
🎨 A cozy atmosphere and charming art style that pleases the eye.
🐾 The perfect game for relaxation and fun!

Dive into the game and find all the differences among your furry friends!

name: Mirror Quest Dog and Cat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, AMD Radeon Graphics, NVIDIA GeForce
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2,4 Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, AMD Radeon Graphics, NVIDIA GeForce
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: In this game, you'll explore 50 colorful illustrations featuring adorable pets and challenge yourself to find between 3 and 10 differences in each picture.
